Most esteemed Senhor Prado

I owe a reply to many official letters and letters from Your Lordship in Montevideo, as well as regarding the money that has been collected for this, since with the payment of the bills about to be made, such remittances cannot be delayed.

Please overlook this reminder and dispose of your very affectionate and grateful friend Domingos José de Almeida Caçapava, March 19, 1839

March — 19 — 39. Almeida

Most Illustrious Senhor Joaquim dos Santos Prado Lima. Chief of Police of the Department and Border of Alegrete. From Domingos José de Almeida.
